title: Collection of letterheads and designer's handwriting
content:
[Details of the project](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019214209/http:/www.craigoldham.co.uk/ongoing/handwrittenletterproject/)  
 [The outcome](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019214209/http:/www.craigoldham.co.uk/ongoing/letters/)

I thought I give the blog a go, seems more like writing messages on bits of lead and throwing them in the nearest spring, still – this project shows the letterheads of some agencies and the handwriting of some designers raises all sorts of questions like ‘why did they think that was a good idea?’ and ‘call that handwriting?’ and ‘why would anyone over the age of 11 use a rainbow pencil?’

Tim
author: timd
